definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: At that point, I decided for him and chose to utilize the loan renewal clause.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上，我决定为他选择了利用贷款续期的条文。

sentences.english: President Clinton revived a tough provision of U. S. trade law in an attempt.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿总统重新祭出美国贸易法中强硬的一条条文。

sentences.english: Nothing in this by-law shall apply to any person who is in the employment of the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本条的条文不适用于任何受雇于公司的人。

sentences.english: This provision is not intended to change or increase an organization's legal obligations.
sentences.chinese: 本条文并无意改变或增加组织的法律义务。

sentences.english: Additions giving expression to the loftier and more spiritual theology of a later time.
sentences.chinese: 增订条文，体现了崇高的精神和更加神学稍后的时间。

sentences.english: I have read all the regulations in the handbook and commit to obey the rules enumerated in said handbook.
sentences.chinese: 本人已阅毕简章条文，并遵守所有简章上相关之规定。

sentences.english: Currently there are no laws or regulations applicable on gay issues.
sentences.chinese: 目前还没有关于同性恋议题的相关法律条文。

sentences.english: Any person who contravenes the provisions of this by-law shall be guilty of an offence against these by- laws.
sentences.chinese: 任何人违反本条的条文，即属犯本附例所订罪行。

sentences.english: You can do so under the provisions of a new foreign aid bill.
sentences.chinese: 根据新的援外法案的条文，你可以这样做。

sentences.english: Some phrases in the contract are open to interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 合同中的某些条文容有不同诠释。

sentences.english: The trial had forced Hadden to investigate the relevant legal codes.
sentences.chinese: 这次审判迫使哈顿仔细地研究相关的法律条文和条款。

sentences.english: I have read all the regulations in the handbook and commit to obey the rules enumerated in the handbook.
sentences.chinese: 本人已阅毕简章条文，并遵守所有简章上相关之规定。

sentences.english: The Chinese constitution-in-action is far more flexible than the written state charter might suggest.
sentences.chinese: 中国的宪法实践远比宪法条文的规定更具弹性。

sentences.english: This article was revealed generally the spoliation of evidence in civil litigation by the educational world.
sentences.chinese: 该条文被学界普遍认为是证明妨碍制度的明文规定。
这个文件包括许多条文。
